game.name: Batman™: Arkham Knight - Catwoman's Revenge
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 아캄 나이트 사건 이후, 이 스토리 팩에서 밤을 배회하며 복수를 원하는 캣우먼이 되어 리들러에게 복수하십시오.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Set after the events of Arkham Knight, prowl the night as Catwoman as she seeks her revenge on the Riddler with this story pack.
